about_the_game: Hell Takes All is a randomly generated rogue-like tower defense game that throws thousands of enemies at you, with your cactuses being the only defense at your disposal. You start as a tiny demon seeking revenge on the Devil. Strategically choose and upgrade your cacti, discover powerful items, and unleash your chosen abilities to create powerful builds. Conquer hell and transform the devil into your subservient ally!

content_descriptors.notes:
Fantasy Violence: Although depicted in a cartoony style, combat can be intense and involve animated pixelated violence.

Hellish Themes: Explore environments inspired by traditional depictions of hell. Some imagery may be unsettling to sensitive players.

short_description: Utilize the unique power of cacti to obliterate thousands of enemies. Choose your items wisely, build a formidable defense, and conquer the depths of hell with precision and skill. Make the devil fear your presence!
